column5: I am going camping on the 24 and am looking for a decent spot preferably near some sort of water body. If it was somewhere between midland and ottawa it would make the drive a bit easier for both parties. Thanks guys
Sorry its the wildlands not highlands and its a pp not crownland.  Wont find many people there though
can't help you, but at least there's a lot of land to choose from between those 2 places!
Ill check that out ty! I know its a lot of land to cover, my one friend and I agree to meet in the middle somewhere and his other buddy starts looking for places to go in quebec..
It's crown land yes, but it's not an operating Prov park at the moment, it has been designated as one, set aside for future use.
PM will be sent in a few minutes.
